title: error open google.com
content:
why when i open the google.com i get the message www.google.com has a security policy called HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS), which means that Firefox can only connect to it securely. You can’t add an exception to visit this site.

The issue is most likely with the website, and there is nothing you can do to resolve it.

If you are on a corporate network or using anti-virus software, you can reach out to the support teams for assistance. You can also notify the website’s administrator about the problem.

Learn more…

please help me to fix it
creator: ivanhandoko73

title: Google search in address bar not working correctly
content:
Hi there,

After a certain period of time browsing, if I try to search for something by typing in the address bar, the google search page does not load. If i keep spamming the enter key to force it, it eventually loads after maybe 20 tries. If i close and reopen firefox the search will work reliably again for a short time before the issue happens again. All of the other search engines (amazon, duckduckgo etc) work fine.

Have tried reinstalling firefox but issue persists. Seemed to start happening after a recent update a week or so ago.

Can you assist?

Many Thanks
creator: mdubrich
